location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a communication (not present) sent by William Bruce to Sir Gore Ouseley, for the information of the Bombay Government, which stated that it is William Bruce's intention to have a set of muskets cleaned; it notes that the same will be done for the arms supplied by the Bussora [Basra] packet, should it be required.
